articles.title: Evolution of enhanced innate immune suppression by SARS-CoV-2 Omicron subvariants - Nature.com
articles.description: SARS-CoV-2 adaptation and evolution led to stronger innate immune suppression by increasing expression of Orf6 in Omicron subvariants.
